title: icons
body: can you use any chaos/order icons other then the first one you unlock to complete missions, or can you only use the first ones?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Confirmed! Any of those Order/Chaos icons can be used to count towards mission!
You can use any of the[ Order/Chaos icons](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017#faq) and it will count towards the missions.
yes thanks just tested it out anyways lol
